title: What is a machine in a computer, and what are the types of computer machines? - Quora

response.answer_text: In theoretical computer science (theory of computation), a machine may be reference to either any hypothetical device capable of performing a computation, or a Turing machine (or variant), a device capable of performing any computation.
The terms ‘computer’ and ‘machine’ are interchangeable. When someone is describing their PC they will often refer to it as a machine or even a ‘rig’ depending on how customized it is.
